SEARCH
Package Geometry

Interface IGeometricShape<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, Polygon, Rectangle, Square, Triangle
public interface IGeometricShape<T>
Represents a geometric shape, containing common operations within geometric shapes

  • Method Summary

    • rotate

      T rotate(double angle, VirtualPoint anchor) throws GeometricException
      Returns a copy of the shape, rotated by the specified angle (in radians) around the anchor point
      Parameters:
      angle - the angle (in radians) to rotate the shape by
      anchor - the point to rotate the shape around
      Returns:
      a rotated copy of the shape
      Throws:
      GeometricException - if the shape is rotated to an invalid position

    • moveCentroid

      T moveCentroid(Point newCentroid) throws GeometricException
      Returns a copy of the shape, translating it so that it's centroid is located at the specified point
      Parameters:
      newCentroid - the new centroid of the shape
      Returns:
      a copy of the shape, relocated to then new centroid
      Throws:
      GeometricException - if the shape is moved to an invalid position
